text: John L. Behan (November 11, 1944 â€“ January 28, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the New York State Assembly from 1979 to 1995. He was a member of the Republican Party. Behan died on January 28, 2021 in Montauk, New York at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John L. Behan
